channel.title: [Req]HELP When equip new custom (cape) body turn invisible
channel.description:
I'm using [PI] [IMG]http://82.156.116.12/pic.png[/img] (The cape looks nice ingame its just)..
My body+Legs turn invisible when i wear the cape i just added to my server
whats the problem?
please help me ... thanks for your time :(
